name: WATSON-XD-BOT
description: A whatsapp bot with rich functions created by Watsonfourpence

OWNER_NUMBER.description: put your Number and name for Owner

owner_react_emojie.description: put one emojie for owner reacts

PREFIX.description: put any one symbol here except @ and + , leave it Blank if you want to use multiple prefix

HKEY.description: Put your Heroku api key Here , Get one from here https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

HAPP.description: Put the Heroku app name, same as above entered

statusview.description: make it true if you want bot to view status

antidelete.description: bot will forward deleted messages if you make it true

ANTI_LINK.description: it will dlt links and kick user

AutoReaction.description: make it true to react on chats

autoreactions_emojies.description: put your favourite emojies for AutoReactions on chats or make it empty for all default emojies

STATUSVIEW.description: make it true to auto view status and likes

StatusEmojies.description: Add your favorites emojies for status likes

STATUS_MSG.value: Your Status has been seen by Watson-Xd-Bot
